name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. William James ELLER, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. William James ELLER, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 18th day of December, 2007, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal No. 404 MAL 2007 is GRANTED. The issue, rephrased for clarity, is:
Whether the Commonwealth expert offered sufficient testimony to support the trial court’s finding that the Petitioner was a sexually violent predator?
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
938 A.2d 986
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. William James ELLER, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Dec. 18, 2007.
